short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically load the View-All version of Wired articles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will simply attempt to load the "viewall" version of wired articles. It detects when you are loading a www.wired.com site, and redirects you to the appropriate link that will load the full article into a single page.

Enjoy!
